tooltip.title: How to play
tooltip.goal: <1>Goal:</1> Pocket all the balls to win.
tooltip.cue: <1>Cue ball safety:</1> If the cue ball is pocketed, it respawns.
tooltip.rotate: <1>Rotate stick:</1> Move the mouse while hovering over the playing field.
tooltip.aim: <1>Lock aim:</1> Press and hold the Mouse Button.
tooltip.charge: <1>Charge shot:</1> Drag the mouse away from the cue ball to set power.
